tool_description: Popular Vehicles API : you will get top rated popular cars and bikes list FREE.
name: Popular Vehicles API
title: Popular Vehicles API

api_list.name: Fetch
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://popular-vehicles-api.p.rapidapi.com/rto/api/v1.0/popular_cars_bikes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "popular-vehicles-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://popular-vehicles-api.p.rapidapi.com/rto/api/v1.0/popular_cars_bikes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "popular-vehicles-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
